Pre-Game Insights: Kings Kangwa from Zambia is a creative player who can score goals and is expected to create scoring opportunities.
Charles M’Mombwa from Tanzania is a flexible player who can play in midfield or attack and has been a regular scorer for Tanzania.
Zambia may win the game, despite this one being a closely contested game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The average number of goals in meetings between Zambia and Tanzania is 3.33.
Zambia have drawn one game while Tanzania have lost one game in the AFCON 2023.
On their last meeting Zambia won by 2 goals.
Others: The match will be played on Sunday, 21st January 2024, at 05:00 PM GMT; 10:30 PM IST at Stade de San Pédro.
Tanzania’s squad dynamics are affected by Miyoshi’s suspension and Allarakhia’s injury.
The predicted lineup for Zambia is (4-4-2) and for Tanzania is (4-3-3)
